resell.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to sell something that you have bought
resell.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The retailer resells the goods at a higher price.
resell.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to sell something that you have bought
resell.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Some firms buy units for investment funds with the intention of reselling at a higher price.
Its aim in purchasing the company was to resell it quickly to another travel firm.
